      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<AnomalousText> process(Document document, HltContentContainer hltContentContainer)
      This definition of the process method takes a Document and HltContentContainer as input and returns as output the list of HltContent objects which include results from HLT text processing.

      This is asynchronous definition of the Process method.
      Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId, List<AnomalousText> hltContents)
      This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for the particular requestId.

      • tryGetResult

        public Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId,
                   List<AnomalousText> hltContents)
        Description copied from interface: IDocumentHltContentProcessor
        This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for the particular requestId. The boolean return type indicates whether output is ready.
        Specified by:
        tryGetResult in interface IDocumentHltContentProcessor<AnomalousText>
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request id
        hltContents - the hlt contents
        Returns:
        the boolean
